p: The predictions and their 95% CIs from the two incidence_fit objects, ‘before’ and ‘after’, can be added to the existing incidence plot of i.pooled using the piping-friendly function add_incidence_fit(). As shown in Figure 5, based on visual comparison of models and data, these two log-linear regression models provide a decent approximation for the actual dynamics of the epidemic (adjusted R 2 = 0.83 and 0.77 for the increasing and decreasing phases, respectively).
